story-summary.description: Implement the Deep Archive theme as CSS custom properties for the AI Obituaries application. This story establishes the complete design system foundation including: - shadcn/ui initialization with dark mode configuration - Deep Archive color palette as CSS variables - Font configuration (Instrument Serif for headlines, Geist for body, Geist Mono for monospace) - Tailwind CSS v4 theme extension - Themed shadcn Button component for validation
story-summary.user-story: As a developer, I want the Deep Archive theme implemented as CSS variables, so that all components use consistent visual styling.

css-architecture.approach: Use @theme inline directive in globals.css for Tailwind v4 theme extension. Define all CSS custom properties under :root selector. Map CSS variables to Tailwind utilities via @theme directive.

naming-strategy.note: This naming convention makes it clear what each variable controls and improves readability in components
